name: Functional Impact
description: A measure of the impact to business functionality or ability to provide services.

values.name: No Impact
values.description: Organization has experienced no loss in ability to provide all services to all users.

values.name: Low
values.description: Organization has experienced a loss of efficiency, but can still provide all critical services to all users with minimal effect on performance.

values.name: Medium
values.description: Organization has lost the ability to provide a critical service to a subset of system users.

values.name: High
values.description: Organization has lost the ability to provide all critical services to all system users.
